title: Resident Evil Revelations 2 Ep1 BoxSet MULTi11-STEAMGAMES

::Description::


During the party on the occasion of receiving Claire to work in the "Terra Saves" unknown armed troops burst into the office. Forwards stun Claire Burton and Moira, who was also present at the party. Later, they both come to mind in the dark and abandoned prison. Together, they must find out who kidnapped them and what sinister purpose.


::System Requirements::


Operating System : Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo E6700, AMD Athlon X2
RAM : 2 GB
Video card : NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS, AMD Radeon HD 3850
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9
Free space on hard disk : 6.5 GB
